title: ‘Hamlet’ Review: A Dirt-Eating Danish Prince, Born to Be Wild
description: Thomas Ostermeier’s production of “Hamlet,” presented as part of the Brooklyn Academy of Music’s Next Wave festival, unleashes more madness than what Shakespeare has already offered.
dc:creator: Maya Phillips
media:description: Lars Eidinger, center, as Hamlet in Thomas Ostermeier’s production, now at BAM’s Harvey Theater in Brooklyn.
